metadata.synopsis: Jaheira lead the harpers to Moonrise after Nightsong was freed. As the player arrives to Moonrise, she greets them and can follow the player for the assault, If she doesn't follow, she will still join combat and move into the tower, in which the player has another oppertunity to have her follow them to fight Ketheric. Once Ketheric flees she will move up to the roof to offer recruitment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Free Nightsong (oe mooassault_alive 1)Walk accross the bridge and talk to Jaheira

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Onward. Let the words of Alaundo ring true.
0.context: NodeContext: Query - she's ready to fight if we need to recruit her

22.speaker: Jaheira
22.text: As long as we hold this floor, the tower is ours. I'll stay here - ensure no one comes up or down without a scimitar welcome.
22.context: NodeContext: Query - she's ready to fight if we need to recruit her

30.speaker: Jaheira
30.text: You're close now. A final audience with Ketheric Thorm awaits.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I detect a hint of envy. Perhaps you'd like to be there for that finale.

19.speaker: Jaheira
19.text: Keen eye. I suppose I could be persuaded.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: On second thought, it is rather vital that this floor remains secured.

7.speaker: Jaheira
7.text: Say no more. Just get the job done.

125.speaker: Jaheira
125.text: May you strike like the viper and choke like the vine. Good luck.

40.speaker: Jaheira
40.text: Later. We have enemies to silence first.
40.context: NodeContext: Query - she's ready to fight if we need to recruit her

45.speaker: Jaheira
45.text: I stand ready to reinforce, if you need it.
45.context: NodeContext: Query - she's ready to fight if we need to recruit her

55.speaker: Jaheira
55.text: 'Unshackled from shadows, she will rise in moonlit glory and carve a path of brightness to the accursed one's second death.'
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Jaheira looks up to where Nightsong is hovering over Moonrise Towers.

27.speaker: Jaheira
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) For this line she looks away from Nightsong and looks to us.

4.speaker: Jaheira
4.text: Seems like his prophecy missed a crucial part, though. Didn't say who gave the angel back her wings.

80.speaker: Player
80.text: I'm not in it for the glory. Victory is all that matters.

110.speaker: Jaheira
110.text: My Harpers are gone, shadows lost in the shadow theatre of my mind alone.

106.speaker: Jaheira
106.text: I'm the last one standing, but I wouldn't be if it weren't for you. So what do you say? Shall we take the final steps together?

79.speaker: Player
79.text: A finale for the great Jaheira? I wouldn't miss it for the world.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: If you're the last Harper standing, it's only fitting that you walk alone.

98.speaker: Player
98.text: Let's just concentrate on the fight ahead. The real battle has yet to begin.

96.speaker: Jaheira
96.text: Believe me, I'm aching to have my revenge.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: The words of a dead man mean nothing.

63.speaker: Jaheira
63.text: Perhaps they don't. I care not. I care only for vengeance.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Crazy old woman. You're talking to yourself.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: I'm- I'm sorry you're alone. That Last Light went as it did.

57.speaker: Jaheira
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Gathered at the bridge that leads to Moonrise Towers stand Jaheira and her Harpers, flanked (potentially) by Counselor Florrick and her Flaming Fist soldiers. They’ve made it here through Nightsong’s corridor of light, while Nightsong herself flies dramatically over the tower.

66.speaker: Jaheira
66.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Gathered at the bridge that leads to Moonrise Towers stand Jaheira and her Harpers, flanked (potentially) by Counselor Florrick and her Flaming Fist soldiers. They’ve made it here through Nightsong’s corridor of light, while Nightsong herself flies dramatically over the tower.

78.speaker: Jaheira
78.text: It's all up to you now. Ketheric awaits.
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Gathered at the bridge that leads to Moonrise Towers stand Jaheira and her Harpers, flanked (potentially) by Counselor Florrick and her Flaming Fist soldiers. They’ve made it here through Nightsong’s corridor of light, while Nightsong herself flies dramatically over the tower.

85.speaker: Jaheira
85.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Gathered at the bridge that leads to Moonrise Towers stand Jaheira and her Harpers, flanked (potentially) by Counselor Florrick and her Flaming Fist soldiers. They’ve made it here through Nightsong’s corridor of light, while Nightsong herself flies dramatically over the tower.

76.text: 'Unshackled from shadows, she will rise in moonlit glory and carve a path of brightness to the accursed one's second death.'
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Gathered at the bridge that leads to Moonrise Towers stand Jaheira and her Harpers, flanked (potentially) by Counselor Florrick and her Flaming Fist soldiers. They’ve made it here through Nightsong’s corridor of light, while Nightsong herself flies dramatically over the tower.

25.speaker: Jaheira
25.text: 'Unshackled from shadows, she will rise in moonlit glory and carve a path of brightness to the accursed one's second death.'
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) Jaheira looks up to where Nightsong is hovering over Moonrise Towers.

32.speaker: Jaheira
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) For this line she looks away from Nightsong and looks to us with a mischievous smile.

34.speaker: Jaheira
34.text: That beacon of angelic wrath has taken the fight to Ketheric on the rooftop, and the first line of defence are dead.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) When she says “You’ll have your hands full storming the tower”, she point towards the MT entrance where the enemy stands guard.

39.speaker: Jaheira
39.text: But storming the tower won't be easy, and if we wait too long, Ketheric will gather his strength and retaliate.
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) When she says “You’ll have your hands full storming the tower”, she point towards the MT entrance where the enemy stands guard.

41.speaker: Jaheira
41.text: For now though, he's on the back foot for the first time since he returned from the grave.
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

52.speaker: Jaheira
52.text: This is it - the spearhead moment. You've brought us this far, so how shall we proceed?
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: We move in and secure the ground floor first - cut off all exits.
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

20.speaker: Jaheira
20.text: A sound strategy. Once it's done, me and my Harpers will hold the ground floor while you hunt down the general himself.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

62.speaker: Jaheira
62.text: Florrick left some of her Flaming Fist - they'll scout the prisons and barracks below, to ensure we're not taken by surprise.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

16.speaker: Jaheira
16.text: Say the word, and we're off.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Actually, I'd rather you join my party, Jaheira.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

91.speaker: Jaheira
91.text: I'm touched. But I'm already spoken for.
91.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She nods towards the assembled Harpers.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Ketheric is a formidable foe. I have need of a formidable ally.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) The assembled soldiers raise their weapons and cheer. Shouts of ‘Victory!’ resound.

5.speaker: Jaheira
5.text: Very well. Side by side we'll stand as we'll rip True Souls from a false god. As good a prophecy as any.
5.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) The assembled soldiers raise their weapons and cheer. Shouts of ‘Victory!’ resound.

47.speaker: Jaheira
47.text: At the ready, Harpers! In this light there will be victory! In this light we will avenge the fallen!
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) The assembled soldiers raise their weapons and cheer. Shouts of ‘Victory!’ resound.

13.text: The time has come. Ketheric will taste of death at last.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) The assembled soldiers raise their weapons and cheer. Shouts of ‘Victory!’ resound.

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: The time has come. Ketheric will taste of death at last.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Your Harpers are big boys and girls. They can handle themselves.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: So be it. See you on the other side.

36.speaker: Jaheira
36.text: Godsspeed. You seem to be their chosen champion after all, against the false Absolute.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: You're the High Harper. You tell me.

84.speaker: Jaheira
84.text: If you're hunting one target among many, the key is to isolate and corner it.

83.speaker: Jaheira
83.text: My Harpers and I will be the noose that closes in around Ketheric, and as it tightens, you'll go in for the kill.

101.speaker: Player
101.text: Do what you will, just don't get in my way.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: I reap every soul in this tower, until we are the last creatures standing.

77.speaker: Jaheira
77.text: Sounds like something my scimitars would say. They'll strike true. See to it you'll do the same.

35.speaker: Jaheira
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

54.speaker: Jaheira
54.text: Ready your weapons, Harpers. Be prepared to strike at my command.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

82.speaker: Jaheira
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

72.speaker: Player
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

37.speaker: Player
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

10.speaker: Jaheira
10.text: Well, that spared us all a tedious confrontation. We'll settle this by the sword.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: What criterion is it that would put me in either camp?

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I am not a True Soul.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: I'm on your side if that's what you're insinuating. On the Harpers' side.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: That celestial being up there? I'm the one who freed her.

104.speaker: Player
104.text: You saw that celestial being flying over the tower, am I right? Well, I'm the one who freed her.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: All you need to know is that I'm here to kill Ketheric Thorm.

122.speaker: Jaheira
122.text: In that case we could find ourselves to be allies indeed. Me and my Harpers came all the way from Baldur's Gate to end the cult of the Absolute once and for all.

58.speaker: Jaheira
58.text: I'm Jaheira, and if our goals align, I may just be pleased to meet you.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Let me prove it to you - join my party.

15.speaker: Jaheira
15.text: This is it then. The assault commences.

103.speaker: Jaheira
103.text: The time has come. Ketheric Thorm will taste of death at last.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: Baldur's Gate? Does that mean the Absolute has spread to the city as well?

119.speaker: Jaheira
119.text: We can talk at length once the day is won - so let's win it first.

118.speaker: Player
118.text: Let's circle this conversation back to some kind of point, shall we?

38.speaker: Jaheira
38.text: The sword-point is the only one that matters now.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I don't need to prove myself to anyone. Now step aside.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

68.speaker: Jaheira
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

70.speaker: Player
70.text: Must I stumble upon another nuisance every other mile? Out of my way, the lot of you!
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

28.speaker: Jaheira
28.text: Foe it is. Strike them down.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Cine) She dramatically draws her two scimitars in preparation for combat.

102.speaker: Jaheira
102.text: You fight well - with skill and purpose.

51.speaker: Jaheira
51.text: I'll hold this floor to ensure no one can escape the tower. You must press on, and find Ketheric Thorm.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Actually, Jaheira, why don't you join me?

6.speaker: Jaheira
6.text: I can't quite put my finger on why I trust you, but I do: the same instinct through which I know a wolf will bite, or allow itself to be petted.

26.speaker: Jaheira
26.text: You'll bite. But not me. Not as long as we run in the same pack.

113.speaker: Player
113.text: Then consider yourself part of the pack.

90.speaker: Jaheira
90.text: So I shall. Now let's run a hunt.

99.speaker: Jaheira
99.text: Different packs then. As you wish. Just get the job done.
